thig6.5:4.1: I was born into an eminent family,
thig6.5:4.3: endowed with a beautiful complexion and figure;
thig6.5:5.2: coveted by sons of the wealthy.
thig6.5:5.3: One sent a messenger to my father:
thig6.5:6.3: I'll give you eight times that
thig6.5:7.1: When I saw the Awakened One,
thig6.5:7.3: I paid homage at his feet,
thig6.5:7.4: then sat down to one side.
thig6.5:9.1: Then, having cut off my hair,
